definition: round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)
meals (abbr. for 伙食[huo3 shi2])/variant of 夥|伙[huo3]
companion/partner/group/classifier for groups of people/to combine/together

sentences.english: The cons cover the hole and hide the concrete.
sentences.chinese: 团伙们掩盖了洞口将混凝土藏好。

sentences.english: His headquarters are somewhere in the Everglades, his gang are a mixed-up bunch.
sentences.chinese: 其总部设在某处沼泽地，他的团伙是一个混合了一堆。

sentences.english: "Organized gangs, maybe 50 men, are coming in on horseback," Tong said.
sentences.chinese: “一个约50人的有组织团伙，都骑着马，”唐说。

sentences.english: Drivers say migrants and people trafficking gangs have attacked their vehicles with metal bars.
sentences.chinese: 司机们称难民和偷渡团伙用金属杆袭击过他们的车。

sentences.english: He suspects young footballers from poorer nations are being targeted by criminal gangs.
sentences.chinese: 他怀疑来自贫困国家的球员是犯罪团伙的目标。

sentences.english: He says the betting rings are well-funded and have long-term plans.
sentences.chinese: 他说，赌球团伙的资金非常雄厚，有着长远的计划。

sentences.english: How did the criminal gangs of Zhang Hong and Zhang Jieliang wash their guilt in collusion with a legal practitioner?
sentences.chinese: 张虹张杰良等犯罪团伙，同法律工作者如何洗罪？

sentences.english: Many in Baltimore believe he was beaten by local criminal gangs.
sentences.chinese: 巴尔的摩的许多人认为他被当地的犯罪团伙殴打了。

sentences.english: The wheels spin in the mud and the men jump out to push it.
sentences.chinese: 轮子在泥浆中打滑，团伙们跳出车外推车。

sentences.english: The cons move through the halls to the infirmary door.
sentences.chinese: 团伙们穿过了过道，来到医务室门口。

sentences.english: The soldiers handcuff the ring leader and cover his head.
sentences.chinese: 士兵们拷上了团伙的头目并盖住他的头。

sentences.english: Later, Joe slipped into crime to help reduce the burden of family.
sentences.chinese: 之后，乔也加入了犯罪团伙，想帮助减轻家庭负担。

sentences.english: The band of thieves decamped in the night.
Police said the amount of money-laundering gang of up to 1 billion pounds.
sentences.chinese: 警方称，该团伙洗钱金额高达1亿英镑。

sentences.english: The local gang forced all the residents in the neighbourhood to kick over 10 dollars a month.
sentences.chinese: 当地黑帮团伙迫使该街区内居民每月缴付10美元。

definition: (of a bird, fish etc) to be caught in a net/(of a tennis ball) to hit the net/(of a criminal) to be captured
to uncover (a criminal plot)/to break open and capture
